import React from'react';import useTeamPage from'../../hooks/useTeamPage';import'./TeamPage.css';import PageHeader from'../../components/PageHeader';import TeamCard from'../../components/TeamCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TeamPage=()=>{const{roomId,teams,loading,isGeneratingProposals,navigate,handleGenerateProposals}=useTeamPage();const headerActions=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/'),className:"secondary-button",children:"\u2190 Back to Home"});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"room-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PageHeader,{title:"Research Teams",subtitle:`${teams.length} ${teams.length===1?'team':'teams'} formed`,actions:headerActions}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content-container",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loading-rooms",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading teams..."})]}):teams.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"empty-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"Team",children:"\uD83D\uDC65"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"No Teams Available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Generate teams from researcher profiles to get started"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate(`/room/${roomId}/profiles`),className:"primary-button",children:"View Profiles"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-grid",children:teams.map(team=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TeamCard,{team:team},team.team_id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"generate-teams-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"generate-teams-btn",onClick:handleGenerateProposals,disabled:isGeneratingProposals||teams.length===0,children:isGeneratingProposals?'Generating Proposals...':'Generate Research Proposals'})})]})})]});};export default TeamPage;
